meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cheesy.
meanings.sent1: The cheesiness of the movie made me cringe.
meanings.sent2: I can't handle the cheesiness of those love songs.
meanings.sent3: The cheesiness of the situation was so exaggerated, it was almost funny.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a cheesiness that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cheesiness of the joke lingered in the air long after it was told.

meanings.definition: Something that is overly sentimental or corny.
meanings.sent1: The cheesiness of the card brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the cheesiness of those cliché lines.
meanings.sent3: The cheesiness of the romantic gesture was endearing in its own way.
meanings.sent4: His cheesiness was like a thick fog, enveloping everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The cheesiness of the proposal made it unforgettable.
